text: If Rihanna wanted to shave your head, would you let her? If your answer is a resounding yes, you have at least one thing in common with dancer Mette Towley. Last week, N. E. R. D, the funk hip - hop band fronted by Pharrell, dropped their music video for their comeback single ` ` Lemon,'' featuring none other than Bad Gal RiRi. The video opens with the singer — wearing a sleek fringed bob, silver chain necklace and Raf Simons'` ` Nebraska'' sweatshirt — wielding clippers in a hotel, giving pause with a laser - like stare into the camera before shaving off Towley's cloud of natural curls.
